data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Karlovarský, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Karlovarský, Czechia

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Karlovarský access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 135 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 2,243 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Karlovarský, Czechia. Please, stir the 2,243 believers here to pray for awakening.
Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, please raise up prophets in Karlovarský who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Karlovarský to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.section_summary:
the state of Karlovarský, Czechia has a population of 304,300.

We estimate Karlovarský has 2,243 people who might know Jesus, 79,418 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 222,639 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 135 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Karlovarský. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.
